item.title: Report: Speaker to Be Challenged by Conservatives
item.description: Conservatives are planning to challenge Mike Johnson, R-La., for speaker of the House during Wednesday's internal election, The Hill reported Tuesday.

item.title: Sen. Rick Scott on Leader Role: Trump's Agenda Priority
item.description: Sen. Rick Scott, R-Fla., said if he is elected Senate majority leader, he will work to advance President-elect Donald Trump's agenda.
